text: @SecPompeo @FaheemTanoli @khamenei_ir FFS its not #WuhanVirus.... its damn simple. US and China r blaming each other. The politicians r there to play politics on the lives of civilians. Isn’t it high time to stop calling this pandemic a Chinese or wuhan virus. How many people infected by people in with Italian virus.
